extendedInfo.description: Tabr is an innovative tabbed scrolling homescreen widget for any device running Honeycomb or Icecream Sandwich! With Tabr you only need one widget to show data from many applications! One widget to rule them all! Add the widget, then add some modules and enjoy the extra space on your homescreen while you quickly switch between modules using the tabs at the top of the widget!Modules can also be created for any application that has a data API, if you are a developer who would like to add Tabr support visit the website.  This applications comes with a Bookmark module and a Contact modules build in. That is why it needs phone/history permissions!You can get more modules from the market (search "Agenda for Tabr" and "Social for Tabr")!Change the layout of any module to suit your fancy, want your bookmarks in a grid view? Do it! Like to see your contacts in a stack view? Feasible and suggested!Perhaps you don't like the icons I've chosen for the modules? That is A-OK because you can customize them with any image or using the ADW icon packs!Some features of this application will become paid only in a few weeks, enjoy them for free for a short time during the open beta!Four modules are currently maintained by me and are currently available: * Contacts (built in to the main application)* Bookmarks (built in to the main application)* Agenda for Tabr (available on the market)* Social for Tabr (available on the market)Here is another neat feature, there is only 1 widget which means no more clutter in your widget selection screen. Use the Honeycomb resize feature to make the widget as large as you like.Upgrade to the full version for a limited time pre-release price, just tap upgrade in the widget settings! In-app billing is part of the Android market, you will be able to restore your licence on new devices or after a factory reset if you use the same market account!Contact the developer if you would like to create skins or modules!

reviews.title: Works on stock galaxy nexus
reviews.comment: Great widget which combines different apps and systemically puts them into tabs. Happily paid for the full version, but can you please add a Gmail tab?   Thanks guys and hope you keep updating!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried to use Tabr for many months and it can\'t update properly.  For example it\'s been almost two weeks since it updated, it should be hourly. Tried reinstalling again and again. This paid for app also doesn\'t seem to be updated by it\'s makers, last time was last year! It shows. Wish it weren\'t so but don\'t buy IMHO.
reviews.author: Shawn Ristvedt

reviews.title: feels unfinished
reviews.comment: Its a great widget but feels a  bit unfinished. Force closes every time I want to change the logo of my tab. Needs tweaking there. Great concept tough, keep up the good work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great concept just needs tweaking
reviews.comment: Even at this early stage, this is already one of the better widgets on Play. That said, it needs tweaking to improve its stability. In 16 hours of use, it crashed twice on my SGSII. Other widgets like APW rarely crash. Dev already got sent my crash logs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Very nice Widgets ... please add a messaging and email module if possible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: would be nice but...
reviews.comment: No visible development or update since March \'12.  I was looking for more tab add-ons as only the agenda is currently of interest,  but the are better widgets for just agenda.  Although it works with a good variety of task apps.  As with almost every widget,  no options or doesn\'t work with other browsers (bookmarks)  or other calendars,  I the stock android versions are useless and I don\'t sync with Google.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless!!
reviews.comment: Crashes all the time almost on every click. This could be a great app but until it actually works don\'t waste your time or money. I Sent crash reports, developer doesn\'t seem to care.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Social tab cannot be used
reviews.comment: I\'ve logged to facebook and twitter but still can\'t be used. Why? I really want to use this widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: its crup
reviews.comment: crashes all the time, most of it configuration do not work at all, and it wont update or even just move between tubs without refreshing every time. DO NOT pay for it, at least
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice.
reviews.comment: After a lot of crashing and reporting it now works beatifully. Waiting patiently for more tabs f.eg. combined email tab.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No phone
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work good on phone only for tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes too often
reviews.comment: After a fresh install, I was rewarded with nothing but crashes. Looping errors that could only be stopped by rebooting my phone. Sounds like a great idea, but this is not how to implement it.  Didn\'t work for me, maybe it\'ll work for you, but why take the chance!
reviews.author: Robert Helms

reviews.title: Eats Battery.
reviews.comment: Negative impact on battery life and needs a worrying amount of permissions for a widget.... does it really need to be able to make phone calls?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good try.
reviews.comment: This is a no go .executive assistant much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: Used to be good but needs updates.. come on dev. how about some updates?
reviews.author: Rich webdevoman

reviews.comment: Excellent widget

reviews.title: Got to be good.
reviews.comment: I have used this devs Agenda app forever, and on that basis alone this app gets 4 starsand I haven\'t even opened it. Plus it\'s a cool idea.
